channel.title: Side Icon Positions For 474?

item.title: Side Icon Positions For 474?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

UG! I can’t get the side icons right. I’ve figured out how to find the positions of the red stones but that method doesn’t seem to work for the side icons >.<

Please can some one give me the 474 side icon positions for a renamed client.

If you don’t know what I’m talking about its something like this

sideIcons[1].method361(48, 10);

Redstones foar everyone btw

if(tabInterfaceIDs[tabID] != -1) { if(tabID == 0) redStone1.method361(6, 8); if(tabID == 1) redStone2.method361(45, 8); if(tabID == 2) redStone2.method361(77, 8); if(tabID == 3) redStone3.method361(110, 8); if(tabID == 4) redStone2_2.method361(143, 7); if(tabID == 5) redStone2_2.method361(176, 8); if(tabID == 6) redStone1_2.method361(209, 9); }

if(tabInterfaceIDs[tabID] != -1) { if(tabID == 7) redStone1_3.method361(27, 0); if(tabID == 8) redStone2_3.method361(64, 0); if(tabID == 9) redStone2_3.method361(97, 0); if(tabID == 10) redStone3_2.method361(129, 1); if(tabID == 11) redStone2_4.method361(163, 0); if(tabID == 12) redStone2_4.method361(196, 0); if(tabID == 13) redStone1_4.method361(229, 0); }

Read full topic
